document_data.name: Elvish Seedcake
document_data.mainbody: '''Elvish seedcakes''' or simply '''seedcakes''', were sweet [[bread]]-like treats that came in loaves and in bite-sized handfood shapes.
document_data.Description: Elvish seedcakes were delectable breads, baked with crushed [[aniseed]], [[caraway]], and [[coriander]] seeds. Some versions of these treats possessed magical capabilities to ''[[cure moderate wounds]]'' on the imbiber.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], small-sized handfood seedcakes were available in the City of Splendors, [[Waterdeep]]. In [[1372 DR]], [[Alicine Bricket]] and [[Muriel Bricket]], served neatly individually wrapped elvish seedcakes during a party in their [[Western Heartlands]] summer home, outside [[Daggerford]], in celebration of their brother [[Elveronne Bricket]]'s demise.
